rule: The output category must be more than a single word and must not match exactly one of the categories: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech.
input: Art exhibition showcases modern paintings in downtown gallery
output: This news article can be classified as: Sci/Tech.
complianceText:
The chatbot output classifies the news article into the Sci/Tech category. This aligns with the description provided, which states that a news article can be classified into one of the categories: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech. The output does not provide any additional information or classification outside of these specified categories, and it adheres to the requirement of providing a single classification.

OK
